about_the_game: Car Crush Racing Simulator is an awesome, fast-paced, off-road racing game where you have to skillfully dodge all the state of art Car Crushing Machines and reach the finish line before everyone else. This adrenaline-pumping extreme sports game will have you at the edge of your seat. Get lots of airtime by driving over cool bumps and ramps performing some astounding stunts. Keeping your vehicle safe is extremely important as you try to keep out of harm's way in a high-intensity obstacle environment. Beware that you have to be extremely careful and stop just at the right place. Right then, it’s time to test your reaction time and have some real fun.
detailed_description: Car Crush Racing Simulator is an awesome, fast-paced, off-road racing game where you have to skillfully dodge all the state of art Car Crushing Machines and reach the finish line before everyone else. This adrenaline-pumping extreme sports game will have you at the edge of your seat. Get lots of airtime by driving over cool bumps and ramps performing some astounding stunts. Keeping your vehicle safe is extremely important as you try to keep out of harm's way in a high-intensity obstacle environment. Beware that you have to be extremely careful and stop just at the right place. Right then, it’s time to test your reaction time and have some real fun.
developers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most recent version of Ubuntu LTS with the Unity, Gnome, or KDE desktops
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Car Crush Racing Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 compatible or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited
short_description: A unique mix of racing, dancing and survival games in one. Extremely dangerous car crusher machines are in action. Compete with your rivals while dodging the car crushing engines.
